issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1.Install the genymotion emulator from their website.
2.Launch the genymotion emulator.
3.Run " ti info -t android -o json ".
4.Under devices check for emulator flag.

h5.Actual Result:
1.The emulator flag shows "false".

h5.Expected Result:
1.The emulator flag should be "true".
fields.summary: CLI : Genymotion emulator is detected as a device
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appcel Studio : 3.2.0.201311140721
Ti SDK : 3.2.0.v20131114152442
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.0
CLI - 3.2.0

comments.body:
Verified fixed on:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311150750
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131114184328
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.3.0

Enabled genymotion using command "ti config genymotion.enabled true"
Genymotion emulators are displayed under android emulators, not devices.
Closing.
